title: 40yo man and 7yo son learn new language difference

content.question: A 40-year-old man and his 7-year-old son move to a country where they have to learn a new language. Compared with his son, the 40-year-old man will

choices.label: have more difficulty learning to produce phonemes that do not exist in his native language
require less active processing to acquire the syntax of the new language
learn the grammar of the new language more slowly but ultimately acquire the language better

content.answer: have more difficulty learning to produce phonemes that do not exist in his native language

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
